name: RectangleWithOutline
description: The unified attribute for the Rectangle With Outline element

content.name: x
content.description:
the X position of the element
default: 0.0

content.name: y
content.description:
the Y position of the element
default: 0.0

content.name: scale
content.description:
the scale of the element
default: 1.0

content.name: angle
content.description:
the angle of the element
default: 0.0

content.name: width
content.description:
the width of the element
default: 10.0

content.name: height
content.description:
the height of the element
default: 10.0

content.name: anchor
content.description:
the anchor point of the element
default: {x:0.0, y:0.0}

content.name: thickness
content.description:
the thickness of the outline
default: 0.0

content.name: body_colour
content.description:
the colour of the element's body
default: {r:1.0, g:0.0, b:0.0, a:1.0}

content.name: line_colour
content.description:
the colour of the element's outline
default: {r:0.0, g:0.0, b:0.0, a:1.0}
